message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a sequential decision problem involving optimization of utility, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of measurements and the analysis of their value falls under the category of data science (cs.DS). The problem of optimizing a sequential decision process is also relevant to control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the use of information theory to analyze the value of measurements suggests the category of information theory (cs.IT).
